data.name: Sample - Kiuwan - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Kiuwan" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Files Defects Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a files with metric values and defects for a specific analysis from kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get Application Analysis
workflows.description: Retrieves a analysis results for a concrete analysis specified by code parameter from Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Delete Analysis
workflows.description: Delete a specific analysis details from Kiuwan based on the analysis code that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Pending Defects for Action Plan
workflows.description: Retrieves the pending defects of an action plan from Kiuwan.

steps.name: Get Pending Defects for Action Plan

arguments.name: Kiuwan
arguments.operationTitle: Get Pending Defects for Action Plan

arguments.title: Kiuwan: Get Pending Defects for Action Plan

routes.name: Start -> Get Pending Defects for Action Plan

workflows.name: Get Analysis List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of analysis from Kuiwan.

workflows.name: Create Suppresion Rule
workflows.description: Create a suppresion rule in Kiuwan based on the defect ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Removed Defects for Action Plan
workflows.description: Retrieves the removed defects of an action plan in Kiuwan.

steps.name: Get Removed Defects for Action Plan

arguments.name: Kiuwan
arguments.operationTitle: Get Removed Defects for Action Plan

arguments.title: Kiuwan: Get Removed Defects for Action Plan

routes.name: Start -> Get Removed Defects for Action Plan

workflows.name: Update Defect Status
workflows.description: Update status of this defect and add a note in Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get Analysis Defects List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all analysis defects for a concrete analysis from Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get Progress Summary for Action Plan
workflows.description: Retrieves the current and the past main metrics and indicators of an application for an action plan from Kiuwan.

arguments.title: Kiuwan: Get Progress Summary for Action Plan

steps.name: Get Progress Summary for Action Plan

arguments.name: Kiuwan
arguments.operationTitle: Get Progress Summary for Action Plan

routes.name: Start -> Get Progress Summary for Action Plan

workflows.name: Get Defects List for Action Plan
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of all defects included in an action plan from Kiuwan.

arguments.title: Kiuwan: Get Defects List for Action Plan

steps.name: Get Defects List for Action Plan

arguments.name: Kiuwan
arguments.operationTitle: Get Defects List for Action Plan

routes.name: Start -> Get Defects List for Action Plan

workflows.name: Get Analysis Codes List
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of analysis codes for an application from Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Create Mutes for Rule or File
workflows.description: Create a mutes for a rule/file in Kiuwan based on the application name and other parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Kiuwan: Create Mutes for Rule or File

steps.name: Create Mutes for Rule or File

arguments.name: Kiuwan
arguments.operationTitle: Create Mutes for Rule or File

routes.name: Start -> Create Mutes for Rule or File

workflows.name: Get Defect Notes
workflows.description: Retrieve a list of notes associated to this defect from kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get Latest Analysis
workflows.description: Retrieves a last analysis for the authenticated user and the application indicated from Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get Comparison Defects
workflows.description: Retrieves a net number of new and removed defects and violated rules after comparing 2 given analyses from Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get New/Removed Defects List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of new/removed defects in an analysis from the previous analysis from Kiuwan.

steps.name: Get New or Removed Defects List

routes.name: Start -> Get New or Removed Defects List

workflows.name: Get Available Action Plans
workflows.description: Retrieves the list of actions plans of an application from Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get Violated Rules
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of violated rules of an analysis for the authenticated user from Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get File Defects
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of defects in a file for a concrete violated rule in Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get Violated Rule Files
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of files where the violated rule affects in Kiuwan.

workflows.name: Get Latest Analysis Files List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of files with metric values and defects of the latest analysis for the named application from Kiuwan.

arguments.title: Kiuwan: Get Latest Analysis Files List

routes.name: Start -> Get Latest Analysis Files List
